chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
data_stream: seq data
choices3: seq bool
choices2: seq bool
choices1: seq bool
c: context

Goal:
hook_complete (c, Unit)

Premises:
Notation Unit := Unit
Notation seq := list
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
context = union_map Label protocol : Type
data = seq nid : Set
hook_complete0 : forall c : context, hook_complete (c, Unit)
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
cat = fun T : Type => fix cat (s1 s2 : seq T) {struct s1} : seq T := match s1 with | [::] => s2 | x :: s1' => x :: cat s1' s2 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T -> seq T Arguments cat {T}%type_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
seq.zip = fun S T : Type => fix zip (s : seq S) (t : seq T) {struct t} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => match t with | [::] => [::] | y :: t' => (x, y) :: zip s' t' end end : forall S T : Type, seq S -> seq T -> seq (S * T) Arguments seq.zip {S T}%type_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> protocol
TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> protocol
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop_spec : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> Type
Inductive CState : Set := CInit : CState | CSentPrep : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitPrepResponse : data -> seq (nid * bool) -> CState | CSentCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CSentAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState Arguments CSentPrep _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitPrepResponse _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentAbort _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckAbort _ _%seq_scope
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Arguments rcons {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
TwoPhaseParticipant.part_with_choices_loop_spec : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> nid -> Type
others = [::] : seq nid
pts = [:: p1; p2; p3] : seq nat
snd_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (send_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes p) (Protocols.coh p))
rcv_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (receive_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes p) (Protocols.coh p))
participant_with_choices : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> forall choices : seq bool, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, PInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists (bs : seq bool) (ds : seq data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size choices, PInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip bs ds))
TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> forall choices : seq bool, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, PInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists (bs : seq bool) (ds : seq data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size choices, PInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip bs ds))
TwoPhaseParticipant.TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices_obligation_1 : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid) (Hpin : p \in pts) (choices : seq bool), conseq (with_spec (TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices_loop l cn pts others Hnin p Hpin choices)) (binarify (fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, PInit) \+ log :-> [::]) (fun=> (fun m : state => exists (bs : seq bool) (ds : seq data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size choices, PInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip bs ds)))
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
cats0 : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), s ++ [::] = s
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | _ :: s' => (size s').+1 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Arguments size {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
participant : forall p : nat_eqType, p \in pts -> forall choices : seq bool, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, PInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists (bs : seq bool) (ds : seq data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size choices, PInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip bs ds))
Injection.InjectExtra.hooks_frame : forall (U W : world) (K : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid), hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> l \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s -> s \In Coh U -> s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> Injection.InjectExtra.not_hooked_by K l -> all_hooks_fire U l st s n msg to -> all_hooks_fire (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) l st (s \+ s') n msg to
orbC = fun __top_assumption_ : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall y : bool, b || y = y || b) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall y : bool, b || y = y || b) false) => if __top_assumption_ as b return ((fun b0 : bool => forall y : bool, b0 || y = y || b0) b) then _evar_0_ else _evar_0_0) (fun __top_assumption_0 : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => true || b = b || true) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => true || b = b || true) false) => if __top_assumption_0 as b return ((fun b0 : bool => true || b0 = b0 || true) b) then _evar_0_ else _evar_0_0) (erefl (true || true)) (erefl (false || true))) (fun...
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
get_rt : forall (w : world) (l : Label), seq (receive_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes (getProtocol w l)) (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l)))
get_st : forall (w : world) (l : Label), seq (send_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes (getProtocol w l)) (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l)))
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Injection.InjectExtra.inj_hooks_complete : forall (U W : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type), valid (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> hook_complete (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K))
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_loop_zero : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> forall ds : seq data, DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, CInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists chs : seq bool, getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size ds, CInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip chs ds))
coordinator_loop_zero : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> forall ds : seq data, DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, CInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists chs : seq bool, getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size ds, CInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip chs ds))
TwoPhaseParticipant.TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices_loop_obligation_1 : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid) (Hpin : p \in pts) (choices : seq bool), conseq ((fix rec (choices0 : seq bool) : DT p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit := let program_branch_0 := fun (c : bool) (chs : seq bool) => fun=> with_spec (TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_round l cn pts others Hnin p Hpin c);; rec chs in let program_branch_1 := fun=> ret p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) tt in match choices0 as choices' return (choices' = choices0 -> DT p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit) with | [::] => program_branch_1 | c :: chs => program_branch_0 c chs end (erefl choices0)) choices) (logvar (fun el :...
cats1 : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (z : T), s ++ [:: z] = rcons s z
TwoPhaseCoordinator.TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_loop_zero_obligation_1 : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (Puniq : uniq pts) (PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::]) (ds : seq data), conseq (with_spec (TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop l cn pts others Hnin Puniq PtsNonEmpty ds)) (binarify (fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, CInit) \+ log :-> [::]) (fun=> (fun m : state => exists chs : seq bool, getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size ds, CInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip chs ds)))
Injection.InjectExtra.hook_completeL : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type), valid (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete U
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
catA : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 s3 : seq T), s1 ++ s2 ++ s3 = (s1 ++ s2) ++ s3
TwoPhaseCoordinator.TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop_obligation_1 : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (Puniq : uniq pts) (PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::]) (dts : seq (seq nat)), conseq ((fix rec (dts0 : seq data) : DT cn (mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit := let program_branch_0 := fun (d : data) (dts1 : seq data) => fun=> with_spec (TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_round l cn pts others Hnin Puniq PtsNonEmpty d);; rec dts1 in let program_branch_1 := fun=> ret cn (mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) tt in match dts0 as dts' return (dts' = dts0 -> DT cn (mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit) with | [::] => program_branch_1 | d :: dts1 => program_branch_0 d dts1...
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans (nodes:=nodes) coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_round : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> bool -> {el : nat * Log}, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (el.1, PInit) \+ log :-> el.2, fun=> (fun m : state => exists (b : bool) (d : data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (el.1.+1, PInit) \+ log :-> rcons el.2 (b, d)))
